page.title: 10BOZEAT'S MAGAZINE
page.content: BOZEAT HAS ITS OWN MAGAZINE CALLED "ABOUT BOZEAT".IT WAS THE IDEA OF MRS. BRANNON AND MRS. EMBLETON WHO THOUGHT THAT NEW PEOPLE COMING INTO THE VILLAGE NEEDED INFORMATION ABOUT WHAT WAS GOING ON. THE FIRST EDITION WAS ISSUED IN MARCH 1980 AND HAD 12 PAGES.THE MAGAZINE HAS BEEN PUBLISHED EVERY THREE MONTHS SINCE THEN.IT IS DISTRIBUTED FREE TO EVERY HOUSE IN BOZEAT.EVERY CLUB IN THE VILLAGE CAN PUT THEIR NEWS IN.THERE IS A VILLAGE DIARY AS WELL SO EVERYBODY KNOWS WHATS GOING ON.MONEY IS RAISED BY ADVERTISING,BUT THE ADVERTISER MUST HAVE A BOZEAT CONNECTION.A RECENT EDITION WAS USED TO DISCUSS THE PROPOSED NEW BY-PASS. NEWCOMERS ARE WELCOMED AS ARE BIRTHS AND MARRIAGES.OLD HISTORICAL DOCUMENTS ARE INCLUDED,THE VILLAGE POLICEMAN WRITES,AND LOCAL RECIPES ARE INCLUDED.
